beer.name: Mom Hefeweizen
beer.description: This Belgian-style blonde ale is an unfiltered fusion of wheat and barley malts, spiced with coriander and ginger.
beer.grains: Great Western Harrington, Klages and Wheat.
Great Western Harrington, Klages and Wheat.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
